intro_only_event_multi_30th_bingo/6901_1: A pretty cool event is happening on Pasio!

If you can complete all its missions,
Zapdos and I will team up with ya!
Well, good luck to you! Smell ya later!
intro_only_event_multi_30th_bingo/6902_1:
Have you checked out that event Blue told
you about?

If you complete all its missions, Moltres and I
will team up with you, too!
Good luck! We’ll be cheering for you!
intro_only_event_multi_30th_bingo/6903_1:
You can sense Red’s excitement about the
event that’s under way!

It seems Red and Articuno are willing to
team up with you if you complete all its
missions!
